name: FeedTheFatties
description:
FEED the FATTIES!

A mash of the Tower Defence and Cooking genres as an entry for Ludum Dare 41.

Hire a team of dedicated chefs to defend the your restaurant from hordes of fast food. harvest the dead fast food and serve them up to your hungry customers. Don't take too long or the chefs won't get paid!

How to hire Chefs:

  • Click chef button at bottom left
  • click a green square
  • buy the chef

How to upgrade a chef

  • Click chef button at bottom left
  • click a chef(on his head)
  • buy the upgrade

How to throw food

  • click the restaurant at the bottom right
  • click and hold the food that is floating in the middle of the screen
  • move your mouse upwards, quickly and release the mouse button at the end of the stroke
  • try to aim

How to change the food your throwing

  • When in restaurant view, click the donut at the bottom right
  • chose a food from the list
